column2: Role & responsibilities  :   Remaining actively involved in organizational control for the entire profit center, developing new business strategies for enriched revenue generation.  Evolving new strategies to enhance the brand, allocating marketing budget, and executing through proper marketing channels. Ensuring over and exceeding performance is attained in terms of getting admissions over and above the expected count and all marketing campaigns and activities are designed and aligned in an appropriate manner.  Incorporating innovative strategies for keeping the Counseling Team, Marketing Team motivated all the time and performance in terms of generating revenues are being achieved over and above the expectation.  Undertaking all necessary activities for ensuring proper execution of the marketing campaigns for yielding desired result.  Undertaking all necessary aggresive marketing / admission steps for meeting and exceeding monthly Admission Targets. Incorporating a monitoring network for all departments and centralizing through a well innovated CRM to capture all the daily data and activities.  Involved in revenue generation, generating leads from the full time and part time programs.  Building relations and tie-ups with various national and international brands for promoting industrial projects of the students and growth of the Organization as a whole. Adroitly performing tie-ups with international institutes, bringing in international and global faculties to make the students understand the global culture which will help them to bridge the global innovation through their designs. Desired candidate profile  :   Proficient in devising sales strategies, developing and maintaining client relationship management and achieving targets by leveraging team's core competencies. Capable of increasing revenues, admissions by manifolds and providing better service level delivery in all aspects in tune with the Image of the Brand.  Experienced in delivering and exceeding targeted numbers of enrolments monthly by the Team and undertaking necessary aggressive steps for maintaining the momentum.  Proven track record in Strategic Planning, Digital Marketing Footprint Management, Revenue Enhancement, New Product Placements, Market Analysis, Project Management, Process Improvement, Innovation Management and Brand Communication. Preferred 10 Years of Experience in Educational sector with proven track record of meeting Admission Targets, Generating Revenues & ensuring Service Excellence is being attained in all spheres in a broad spectrum. Excellent Communication skill with strong Leadership Quality, capability of handling different verticals, ensuring the desired level of performance is being attained and a healthy work culture is being maintained.
column11: Admission Counselling, Generating Admisions, Marketing And Sales, Revenue Enhancement, Centre Management, Educational Marketing, Department Management, Education Counseling, Career Counselling

column2: The Local Marketing Sales Consultant is responsible for the local partner communication and implementation of client marketing programs. It is both an inbound, outbound and consultative sales role fostering a relationship with our local affiliates.                             Responsibilities                             Working with a wide range of BrandMuscle clients (primarily via phone and email) to understand their marketing needs and effectively communicating pre-determined marketing programs to them                         Keeping accurate records of conversations and affiliate relationships utilizing a CRM system                         Maintaining ongoing communication around marketing programs and campaign performance with clients and collecting their feedback for ongoing program growth                         Project management of many local client marketing programs                          Collaborating, internally, to grow and develop marketing programs                         Processing claims and associated details for media orders                         Providing ongoing feedback and assessment of project status and issues to managers                             Requirements                             Bachelor s degree in marketing, communications, or a related field is required                         1-3+ years marketing or advertising experience                         Experience within technology or professional services preferred                         Customer service oriented and professionalism in dealing with difficult customer situations                         Strong knowledge of Digital Marketing Programs and Strategies                         Tech savvy with an ability to learn and work in multiple systems simultaneously                         Well versed in use of Microsoft office products (Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook)                          Detail-oriented and excellent organizational skills                         Self-starter, ability to work without direct supervision                         Availability to occasionally accommodate various working hours as client workload requires                         Superior communication skills; both verbal and written
column11: Outbound, Marketing programs, Project management, Customer service, professional services, Customer Service Associate, Digital marketing, MS Office, Marketing communication, CRM

column2: Job Description:   We are seeking a talented and experienced Website Marketing to oversee our digital marketing efforts focused on driving traffic, engagement, and conversions on our website. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in website marketing and a strong understanding of digital marketing strategies and tactics.  Responsibilities:   Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies to drive traffic, engagement, and conversions on our website.  Optimize website content and structure for search engine visibility and user experience, including keyword research, on-page optimization, and technical SEO.  Manage digital advertising campaigns, including pay-per-click (PPC), display advertising, and remarketing efforts, to increase website traffic and conversions.  Coordinate with content creators, designers, and developers to create compelling website content, landing pages, and multimedia assets.  Implement conversion rate optimization (CRO) strategies to improve website performance and maximize conversion opportunities.  Monitor website analytics and performance metrics, including traffic, engagement, conversion rates, and ROI, and provide regular reports and insights to stakeholders.  Stay informed about industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in website marketing and digital advertising, and recommend innovative strategies to drive results.  Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and product development, to align website marketing initiatives with overall business objectives.  Stay abreast of regulatory requirements and best practices related to website marketing, data privacy, and online advertising compliance.  Requirements:   Bachelor's degree in marketing, MBA preferred or related field.  Proven experience in website marketing roles, with a minimum of 3-5 years of experience in digital marketing or related fields.  Strong understanding of website analytics tools such as Google Analytics, as well as experience with A/B testing, heat mapping, and other CRO techniques.  Proficiency in SEO best practices, keyword research tools, and technical SEO optimization.  Experience managing digital advertising campaigns across platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads.  Excellent project management skills with the ability to prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and work effectively in a fast-paced environment.  Strong analytical skills and data-driven decision-making capabilities, with the ability to interpret and communicate insights from website analytics data.  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and external partners.  Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a focus on driving continuous improvement and innovation in website marketing initiatives.    Timing:   Mon to Friday:   2:00pm to 10:00pm. ??????????????? Alternate Saturday & Sunday Fixed off
column11: SEO and SEM Specialist, Financial Services Marketing Executive, Content Marketing Executive, Website Marketing Specialist, Online Marketing Executive, Web Marketing Coordinator, Accounting Marketing Specialist, Digital Marketing Executive

column2: Hello All, Greetings !!   Position Overview: We are looking to hire a dynamic Marketing - PR Specialist to join the Marketing Team at eClinicalWorks. In this role, you will maintain public relations databases, draft press releases, organize PR engagements, and maintain good client relationships. To ensure success as a PR Specialist, you must have a collaborative and solution-based approach. A top-notch PR Specialist will display exceptional written and verbal communication skills.  Job details: Working days: 5 days  Working Shift: 4 pm to 1 am (Home Pickup & drop facility is provided within transport boundary till Vasai, Thane & Belapur) work Location : Andheri    RESPONSIBILITIES Managing PR calendars including press releases, editorials, press conferences, events, etc.  Maintaining PR databases including, not limited to, documentation of media coverage, relevant PR metrics, and media list.  Collaborating with team members in brainstorming and planning strategies to maintain the companys public image.  Assisting in the organization and execution of marketing campaigns.  Conducting industry research to support company priorities, brand awareness, and maximize coverage.  Writing and distributing press releases.  Cultivating strong relationships with media outlets and clients.  Researching industry trends related to PR, brand awareness, and awards.  Cross-departmental collaboration   REQUIREMENTS   Bachelor's degree in public relations, marketing, journalism, or a relevant field.  2+ years of experience in public relations or marketing.  Knowledge of public relations best practices, brand management, media strategies, and industry trends.  Excellent written and verbal communication skills and knowledge of press release style guidelines. (must present a portfolio) Ability to collaborate with members of the media.    PREFERRED REQUIREMENTS   Solid organizational skills and the ability to work well in a fast-paced environment.  Knowledge of design software (Adobe Creative Suite) and experience working with social media platforms is a plus.  Project management experience is a plus.      Perks & benefits : Home P/U & Home Drop for all shifts Air-conditioned Vehicle (In the transport boundary) Night shift Allowance Mediclaim for Self & Parents Yearly Bonus - Performance Based Life term Insurance for employees Canteen Facility Psychological Counselor Telehealth Nutritionist Kindly share your resume on  pratibha.mishra@eclinicalworks.com
column11: Press Release, communication skills, Press Release Writing

column2: Job Title: Marketing Executive _BTL Overview: The University Marketing Department is seeking a dynamic and creative Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for higher education and a deep understanding of digital marketing strategies to effectively promote our university's brand, programs, and initiatives. Responsibilities:   Identify the right media mix, and create innovative media plans at the best prices, with highest RoI and freebies across TV, radio, cinema, outdoor, print and other offline channels Manage the relationships with the creative and media planning agencies to develop communication and media strategies Managing the procurement and rollout of marketing collaterals for dealers, Droomers, investors and other stakeholders BTL Activations & Events 1. Planning and executing all BTL activities, events, and promotions Youth marketing across top B-school, Engineering and other campuses Local marketing in malls/RWA/exhibitions/other activations Sponsorships or collaborations for higher awareness or leads Partnerships and barter deals Dealer Summit to be held across North & West India eCommerce Day, Track Day, Conference, Auto Awards, Calendar to be held annually Create new offline and online properties Identifying opportunities, keeping in mind their effectiveness and relevance   Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field required.  Marketing Budget, Media Tie-ups, BTL activation / Road shows etc. Brand Management Marketing Strategies & Campaigns Public Relations Crisis Management Media Relations Strategic Communications Internal Communications People Management Content Creation, Conceptualization & Management Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and metrics to drive decision-making. Creative thinker with the ability to generate innovative ideas and campaigns. Strong organizational and project management skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines effectively. Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment. Passion for higher education and a commitment to promoting the university's mission and values. Interested candidates kindly mail your CV to pooja.jaiswal@ramahospital.com

column2: Job Title: CG Producer Overview: As a CG Producer, you will be responsible for overseeing the entire process of computer-generated (CG) content creation, from conception to final delivery. You will manage teams of artists, ensuring that projects are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. This role requires strong leadership skills, excellent communication, and a deep understanding of the CG production pipeline. Responsibilities: 1. Project Management: Lead and manage CG projects from initiation to completion, including defining project scope, creating schedules, allocating resources, and monitoring progress. 2. Team Leadership: Supervise and motivate teams of artists, animators, providing guidance, feedback, and support throughout the production process. 3. SH Communication: Serve as the primary point of contact for stakeholders, communicating project milestones, addressing feedback, and managing expectations to ensure SHs satisfaction. 4. Budgeting and Resource Allocation: Develop project budgets and allocate resources effectively to maximize efficiency. 5. Risk Management: Identify potential risks and challenges during production and develop strategies to mitigate them, ensuring that projects stay on track and within budget. 6. Pipeline Optimization: Continuously evaluate and improve the CG production pipeline, implementing best practices and tools to streamline workflows and enhance productivity. 7. Quality Assurance: Maintain high-quality standards throughout the production process, conducting reviews and approvals to ensure that deliverables meet SH requirements and industry standards. 8. Collaboration: Foster a collaborative work environment, facilitating communication and teamwork among departments to ensure seamless integration of CG elements into final deliverables. 9. Documentation and Reporting: Keep detailed records of project progress, and milestones, and generate regular reports for stakeholders to track project status and performance. Requirements: 1. Bachelor?? degree in business management or related field; advanced degree or certification in Project Management is a plus. 2. Proven experience (5+ years) in CG production, with a track record of successfully managing complex projects from concept to delivery. 3. Strong leadership and interpersonal skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate multidisciplinary teams to achieve common goals. 4. Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to articulate ideas and convey complex information clearly and effectively. 5. Proficiency in project management tools and software, such as Microsoft Project, Excel, or Workfront, to create schedules, track progress, and manage resources. 6. Basic understanding of the CG production pipeline, including modelling, texturing, lighting, rendering, and compositing processes. 7. Basic knowledge of industry-standard CG software and tools, such as Maya, Adobe Creative Suite, etc. 8. Experience working with clients in advertising, film, television, gaming, or other relevant industries, with a strong understanding of client needs and expectations. 9. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think strategically, anticipate challenges, and develop effective solutions under pressure. 10. A passion for creativity, innovation, with a keen eye for visual aesthetics and attention to detail. Note: This job description is intended to outline the general responsibilities and qualifications for the role of CG Producer. Duties and requirements may vary depending on the specific needs of the hiring organization and the nature of the projects being undertaken.
column11: CG Artist, Project Execution, CG Producer

column2: The Business Development Coordinator is a role within the Professional Services Division at ClinicMind that is dedicated to a specific brand      Working closely with the VP of Business Development, this position is instrumental in executing strategies, creating a market presence and managing affiliate relationships      The role involves coordinating event logistics, managing events registrations, and oversees travel and accommodation arrangements for staff      Collaborates with Marketing on social media campaigns and liaises with Paid Affiliates and Sponsored Speakers to maximize event impact      Also responsible for managing Genesis Success Partners agreements, tracking KPIs, and ensuring timely payments and reporting        Duties and Responsibilities        Event Target Support: Assist the VP of Business Development in investigating external events and targeting the best opportunities to increase market presence and attain new relationships.          Affiliate Liaison: Act as the primary point of contact for business administrative tasks related to affiliates and sponsored speakers. This includes and is not limited to providing agreements for execution, details for events, confirming payments to affiliates and sponsored speakers.          Event Management: Oversee and coordinate the execution of live events. This includes registration, procuring electric/wifi, coordinating with ClinicMind event staff to confirm travel, hotel and booth arrangements.          Marketing Team Collaboration: Work closely with the VP of Business Development and the Marketing Team to create and launch collaborative marketing initiatives between ClinicMind and affiliates. Also, collaborate with the marketing team to keep social media of events up to date.          Performance Monitoring: Work closely with the VP of Business Development to track and analyze the performance of business development initiatives.          Market Research: Conduct market research to stay informed about industry trends and competitor strategies, using insights to enhance business development efforts.        Qualifications        Preferably in Business Administration, Marketing, Communications, or a related field.          1-3 years of experience in a business administration role, with a focus on client relationship management.          Familiarity with digital platforms such as Hubspot, Salesforce, Google Documents, Google Sheets and other relationship management tools.          Experience working business administration including external client facing communications.          Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and work under tight deadlines.        Skills and Abilities        Strong Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively liaise with various stakeholders and external agencies.          Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze documents, data and derive actionable insights.          Organizational Skills: Strong organizational and time-management skills, with a keen attention to detail.          Creative Thinking: Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas for collaborative marketing initiatives.          Team Collaboration: Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and with cross-functional teams.          Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to change.          Technical Proficiency: Proficiency with CRM systems (like Salesforce), project management tools (like Monday), and Google Documents and Sheets.                Position Requirements:            Must have a stable internet connection minimum of 25 MBPS          Must have a mobile data plan as a backup          Must be in a quiet environment          Must be comfortable working the US business hours          Must own a PC with at least 8 GB of memory
column11: Relationship management, Administration, Project management, Social media, Healthcare, Market research, WiFi, CRM, Logistics, Salesforce

column2: If you dont fit into above JDs but you still are passionate to work with us.  There are only two ways to be a part of Fruitbowl Digital Gang: .    INTERNSHIPS AT FRUITBOWL    We are always on a lookout for raw fruits! Here at Fruitbowl, We promise you that WONT be answering the phone or making cups of coffee! Our internship program has been specifically tailored to help you develop skills that will help you seamlessly transition from the classroom to the boardroom. Together,  well go on a hands- on journey that will show you how to apply your skills and knowledge in the real world crafting real experiences that touch consumers. Whether youre interested in account services,  project management,  creative,  strategy or user experience,  well make sure you get the right exposure! And while we cant promise you three- course lunches and all the jazz,  you will leave with the knowledge of how a cutting- edge agency operates,  the roles everyone plays,  and how we all work together to bring our clients brands,  products and services to the forefront of consumer consciousness.  The aim is to explore,  to try out new things,  to keep our creative juices pumping and have amazing time when we are at it.      There are only two ways to be a part of Fruitbowl Digital Gang:   Fruitbowl Digital is looking for Graphic Interns who are well versed with Photoshop,  Coral Draw and/ or should have basic knowledge of Illustrator. A graphic intern should be able to visualize and create concepts as well as execute them to perfection.       READ MORE  We at FruitBowl Digital believe that the best way to create something awe- inspiring is to work with an eclectic bunch of creative minds and together we can kick- ass. If you think youve got the mad passion we seek,  the killer skills to create something worthy of being inspired,  shared,  tweeted or awarded,  wed be more than glad to have you as a part of our team.  The benefit of an internship is to enhance the classroom education with practical applied experience in the real world. An Internship can be a method of on the job training for professional careers.  Although interns are typically college or university students,  they can also be high school students or post-  graduate adults. On occasion,  they are middle school or even elementary students. In some countries,  internships for school children are called work experience. Internships may be paid or unpaid,  and are usually understood to be temporary positions. Unpaid and low- paid internships can run afoul of minimum wage laws,  which sometimes have exceptions for educational positions.  How important is it really to do an internship before applying for a job Do you need to get the hands- on experience that is talked about when discussing the importance of internships or is it really a matter of just landing the right job   What if I dont have time to do an internship   During the school year students may feel overwhelmed with coursework,  sports,  or co- curricular activities that may keep them extremely busy while leaving no time to think of doing an internship or a job. Many students may also feel that they are caught in a bind since they need to make money to pay for their expenses but they can only find unpaid internships in their field.   Getting Your Feet Wet by Doing an Internship:   Internships are a proven way to gain relevant knowledge,  skills,  and experience while establishing important connections in the field. Internships are also a way to get your feet wet and find out if a specific field is something you could see yourself doing as a full- time job. Internships may be completed during fall or spring semester or full time over the course of the summer. Unpaid internships may be easier to get but may also pose problems if making money is necessary,  especially during the summer. The problem is there are many who cannot afford to work for nothing so that they are forced into doing menial jobs in order to work their way through college. This may preclude some from doing an internship which may really be a detriment when hoping to get a full- time job.   Financial Considerations When Doing an Internship:   Financial considerations when looking for an internship can make a big difference in the decision- making process. Sometimes students will do a part- time or full- time job to supplement the time that they are spending at their internship. Whether an internship is paid or unpaid there are many things that need to be taken into consideration in order to decide if an internship is worthwhile. Its important to decide if an internship will ultimately be in the best interest of the student in order to help them meet the requirements they will need when applying for a full- time job.   Doing an Internship and a Job:   Students may elect to do a summer internship a couple of days per week while working a part- time job for the remainder of the time. For those who need to maximize the amount of money they make over the course of the summer,  they may look into doing an internship during the academic year when they are less likely to expect to make money to help defray their college expenses. In addition to internships,  volunteer opportunities can also be an excellent way to gain experience and exposure to the work force. Employers love to see volunteer experiences on a students resume. Volunteering shows commitment to causes and certain values that are intrinsic to the individual who have participated in these types of experiences. Employers look for employees who are publicly engaged and who take an interest in community service and in doing good work.   What Employers Want   Internships and volunteer experiences make candidates more competitive in the job market. In addition to gaining exposure and experience in the field,  they also provide an opportunity to see if the particular career field is the right one based on getting personal experience in the field. No matter what opportunities you engage in,  its important to maintain professionalism and take on the individual responsibility that is required.   The Benefits of Doing an Internship   By doing a great job and completing more than what is required of you in your internship,  you will be creating a great impression that can provide a great reference letter at the least and may even potentially lead to a potential job offer. When you leave the organization at the end of the internship,  you should ask for a recommendation letter that you can keep on file for future reference.   Internships are a Learning Experience:   Internships are a great way to learn the ropes so even if you find yourself filing or making coffee,  as long as youre learning about the field take advantage of the opportunity and dont take the experience lightly. Asking questions is one key to learning in an internship and keeping yourself flexible throughout the internship can open many doors.  Generally,  an internship consists of an exchange of services for experience between the student and an organization. Students can also use an internship to determine if they have an interest in a particular career,  create a network of contacts,  or gain school credit. Some interns find permanent,  paid employment with the organizations with which they interned. This can be a significant benefit to the employer as experienced interns often need little or no training when they begin regular employment. Unlike a trainee program,  however,  employment at the completion of an internship is not guaranteed.  Therefore an internship can be highly beneficial when done during college,  as it helps you gain knowledge about the industry you will be working with,  in the near future.

management              Manage individual event budgets              Measure and report on the effectiveness of each event/campaign i.e. leads and ROI              Process all event administration and logistics              Manage promotional stock by coordinating requirements with regional offices and placing orders with external vendors                      Personal attributes and skill sets writing and communication skills              Proficient in using the Web to conduct research              Sound knowledge of Microsoft Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint                      Desired Experience / Requirements:                  Bachelor s degree, or equivalent              Experience working in a people management capacity              Must be comfortable splitting time between office and remote working              Must be comfortable with European and transatlantic travel

column2: The opportunity EYs Brand, Marketing and Communications function is on a journey to grow and improve world-class marketing and communication technology stack across all member firms worldwide. In a multi-year transformation program, we are making significant investments in technology.? The BMC Technology Delivery Leader reports to the BMC Technology Enablement Leader and is responsible for leading the strategic execution of the BMC technology roadmap and the delivery of innovation and change to the BMC Technology portfolio ??with rigor and execution excellence. The BMC Tech Delivery Leader works closely with all leaders across BMC and their teams to ensure the successful delivery of our BMC technology roadmap. They have a key role in ensuring collaboration and synchronisation between the Product management teams and EY Technology Your key responsibilities In this role, you will be responsible for leading the strategic execution of the BMC technology roadmap and the delivery of innovation and change to the BMC Tech portfolio. This will include establishing and managing best in class project teams across multiple pillars of BMC. The role will entail: Driving cohesion and alignment across all delivery teams and vendor to achieve quality deliverables within budget and in time - in line with leadership expectations and to deliver on BMC strategy? Prioritizing across a portfolio of projects to ensure delivery excellence? Leading projects across a complex stakeholder group to deliver optimal solutions while managing resource constraints and prioritization Holding the teams to the highest standards in terms of rigour, project discipline and responsibility while ensuring everyone's behaviour embodies EY values Skills and attributes for success Exceptional large program management capability honed in complex organizations, working with mixed business, technology and vendor teams Understanding and knowledge of Marketing and Communications Technology solutions in large organizations Proven ability to balance day to day delivery needs, whilst embracing the ongoing innovation potential of new tools and technologies Comfortable working in a matrixed organisation with excellent communication and networking skills - able to effectively manage and influence senior leaders as well as a broad range of stakeholders Solution focused with a high level of persistence to overcome resistance and obstacles Strong influencing skills to build a compelling case for change and gain acceptance of product or service Leadership skills to successfully lead large, diverse and virtual teams, and in some cases, without formal authority Driving operational improvements and efficiencies through the creation and implementation of rigorous process and controls, acts as a gatekeeper for quality Experience in a cross-border role, successfully managing multiple complex projects at a global and regional level To qualify for the role, you must have Excellent project management skills ideally SAFE certified or similar Strong change management experience Experience working across global teams, leveraging offshore and vendor resources Ideally, you??l also have Visionary/ innovative and strategic thinker whilst maintaining focus on details ?A network outside EY to get fresh ideas? What we look for? We??e looking for an experienced, determined individual who enjoys driving change and who wants to shape and help transform the BMC function. What we offer We offer a competitive remuneration package where you'll be rewarded for your individual and team performance. Our comprehensive Total Rewards package includes support for flexible working and career development, and with FlexEY you can select benefits that suit your needs, covering holidays, health and well-being, insurance, savings and a wide range of discounts, offers and promotions. Plus, we offer: Support, coaching and feedback from some of the most engaging colleagues around Opportunities to develop new skills and progress your career The freedom and flexibility to handle your role in a way that's right for you

column2: The Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song Practice | Marketing Transformation | Marketing Transformation Manager for Sustainability Join our team of Marketing Transformation consultants who solve customer facing challenges at clients spanning sales, service and marketing to accelerate business change. Practice:The Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song I Areas of Work:Sustainable Operating models, Circular Economy, Energy Transition, e-Mobility, Product Marketing, Organizational constructs, Omnichannel Marketing, Branding, Brand, Marketing, Creative & Marketing Strategy, Performance Marketing, Sustainability Communication | Level:Manager | Location:Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, Gurgaon, Hyderabad | Years of Exp: 9+ years Explore an Exciting Career at Accenture Are you passionate about scaling businesses using in-depth frameworks and techniques to solve customer facing challenges? Do you want to design, build and implement strategies to enhance business performance? Does working in an inclusive and collaborative environment spark your interest? Then, this is the right place for you! Welcome to a host of exciting global opportunities within Accenture's Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song practice. The Practice A Brief Sketch The Strategy & Consulting Global Network Song practice is aligned to the Global Network Song Practice of Accenture and works with clients across their marketing, sales and services functions. As part of the team, you will provide transformation services driven by key offerings like Marketing Transformation, Connected Commerce and Next-Generation Customer Care. These services help our clients become living businesses by optimizing their marketing, sales and customer service strategy, thereby driving cost reduction, revenue enhancement, customer satisfaction and impacting front end business metrics in a positive manner. The Marketing Transformation Manager is a mid-level position within the Marketing transformation vertical of Accenture GN Song. The individual will be responsible for leading and overseeing strategic initiatives, designing, developing and implementing operating models and build organizational constructs that will empower clients to transform the way they deliver value through marketing. This role requires strong consulting, leadership, and communication skills, and a deep understanding of sustainability marketing technologies and trends. The key responsibility will include: Developing comprehensive marketing strategies, assessing current marketing processes, technologies, and capabilities, and identifying areas for improvement in sustainability marketing transformation. Creating new operating models and organizational structures that encompass people, processes, technology and governance within and across marketing organizations to drive value and achieve desired business outcomes in sustainability. Guiding clients towards sustainable business practices, involving providing expert advice, developing strategies, and implementing solutions that integrate environmental, social, and economic considerations into clients' operations. Collaborate with clients to drive positive impact and foster a culture of sustainability within their organizations. Their position requires a blend of strategic thinking, analytical prowess, and effective communication to drive meaningful change and create lasting value for clients. Developing strategic sustainability plans that are tailored to the client's sustainability goals. Carry out research and ecology surveys, if needed and use environmental impact assessments to measure issues such as carbon footprint, energy performance, air quality and noise pollution, etc. Collaborating closely with the clients to gather and analyze information, determine valuable opportunities for improving sustainability marketing and operations, and orchestrate roadmaps, organizations and operations for successful implementation. Provide advice around how clients can meet regulations laid out in environmental law or as per UN's 2030 Sustainability Development Goals Recommend technologies and explain the most cost-effective and beneficial routes to sustainability by building an end-to-end value case. Keep up to date with current research, market trends and legislation in the area of Sustainable Branding and Communication Educating and training team members and stakeholders on key topics related to sustainable marketing & branding. Leading teams to deliver value through developing new and updated operating models, change, training and communication plans for clients undergoing transformation. Leveraging knowledge of marketing strategy, brand and campaign operations to develop plans and approaches for clients to implement sustainability programs, policies, and practices, enabling client teams to adopt in a "new way of working." Supporting new business opportunities through, participating in pitches and RFP responses Collaborating with other functional teams to deliver more holistic transformation solutions such as brand, creative and marketing strategy. Support and participate in thought leadership for marketing challenges to orchestrate and operate in new ways, including Agile Marketing, to achieve their goals.Key Skills:Sustainability Strategy, Sustainable Marketing & Media, Creative and Marketing Strategy, Marketing Technology, Content Management, Campaign Management, Product Marketing, Data Analysis and Insights, Customer experience, Strategic thinking, Analytical skills, Project ManagementIn addition, in order to excel at the role, you will also need to have Understanding of business dynamics, market trends, and competitive landscape to align sustainability marketing transformation efforts with broader business objectives. Strong project management skills to oversee sustainability marketing transformation initiatives, manage timelines, budgets, and resources, and ensure successful implementation. Ability to lead and inspire cross-functional teams, foster collaboration, and drive alignment towards sustainability marketing transformation goals. Ability to analyze large volumes of data and combine them with macroeconomic factors and competitive benchmarking to cull out insights relevant for stakeholder teams Be adept at working in a fast-paced dynamic environment both on offshore and onshore locations  Strong communication and presentation Skills to share the perfect pitch with key stakeholders Strong client handling skills to develop, manage and deepen relationships with key stakeholders Team building skills to collaborate, work and motivate teams with diverse skills and experience to achieve goals Possess strong leadership skills along with strong communication, problem solving, organizational and delegation skills to nurture and inspire team members Identify new opportunities, develop solutions and own proposals end to end Contribute to offering development skills to identify areas of growth related to specific skills, platforms, assets etc. that contribute to enhancing the brand and creative strategy offeringRead about us. Blogs Qualification Your experience counts! MBA from a tier 1 institute with preferably bachelor's degree in marketing, Strategy, Sustainability Services, Journalism, Communications, or a related field Overall experience of 9+ years with at least 2 years in sustainable services/operations, and minimum 5 years in marketing strategy/operations with a major consulting firm/marketing agency or a leading MnC Experience in working with middle to management levels within existing organization / client organizations Hands-on experience and understanding of tools / platforms (like Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Systems, Content Management Systems (CMS), Analytics tools like Google Analytics, Data Management Platforms (DMP), Customer Journey Mapping Tools, Customer Journey Mapping Tools, Project Management Software like Asana, Trello, or Jira etc.) Experience in working across multiple industries Experience in setting up and growing teams to meet needs across skills, geographies and industriesWhat's in it for you? An opportunity to work on transformative projects with key G2000 clients Potential to Co-create with leaders in strategy, industry experts, enterprise function practitioners and, business intelligence professionals to shape and recommend innovative solutions that leverage emerging technologies. Ability to embed responsible business into everythingfrom how you service your clients to how you operate as a responsible professional. Personalized training modules to develop your strategy & consulting acumen to grow your skills, industry knowledge and capabilities Opportunity to thrive in a culture that is committed to accelerate equality for all. Engage in boundaryless collaboration across the entire organization.

column2: The Business Development Coordinator is a role within the Professional Services Division at ClinicMind that is dedicated to a specific brand      Working closely with the VP of Business Development, this position is instrumental in executing strategies, creating a market presence and managing affiliate relationships      The role involves coordinating event logistics, managing events registrations, and oversees travel and accommodation arrangements for staff      Collaborates with Marketing on social media campaigns and liaises with Paid Affiliates and Sponsored Speakers to maximize event impact      Also responsible for managing Genesis Success Partners agreements, tracking KPIs, and ensuring timely payments and reporting        Duties and Responsibilities        Event Target Support: Assist the VP of Business Development in investigating external events and targeting the best opportunities to increase market presence and attain new relationships.          Affiliate Liaison: Act as the primary point of contact for business administrative tasks related to affiliates and sponsored speakers. This includes and is not limited to providing agreements for execution, details for events, confirming payments to affiliates and sponsored speakers.          Event Management: Oversee and coordinate the execution of live events. This includes registration, procuring electric/wifi, coordinating with ClinicMind event staff to confirm travel, hotel and booth arrangements.          Marketing Team Collaboration: Work closely with the VP of Business Development and the Marketing Team to create and launch collaborative marketing initiatives between ClinicMind and affiliates. Also, collaborate with the marketing team to keep social media of events up to date.          Performance Monitoring: Work closely with the VP of Business Development to track and analyze the performance of business development initiatives.          Market Research: Conduct market research to stay informed about industry trends and competitor strategies, using insights to enhance business development efforts.        Qualifications        Preferably in Business Administration, Marketing, Communications, or a related field.          1-3 years of experience in a business administration role, with a focus on client relationship management.          Familiarity with digital platforms such as Hubspot, Salesforce, Google Documents, Google Sheets and other relationship management tools.          Experience working business administration including external client facing communications.          Proven ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and work under tight deadlines.        Skills and Abilities        Strong Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to effectively liaise with various stakeholders and external agencies.          Analytical Skills: Ability to analyze documents, data and derive actionable insights.          Organizational Skills: Strong organizational and time-management skills, with a keen attention to detail.          Creative Thinking: Creative mindset with the ability to generate innovative ideas for collaborative marketing initiatives.          Team Collaboration: Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and with cross-functional teams.          Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to change.          Technical Proficiency: Proficiency with CRM systems (like Salesforce), project management tools (like Monday), and Google Documents and Sheets.                Position Requirements:            Must have a stable internet connection minimum of 25 MBPS          Must have a mobile data plan as a backup          Must be in a quiet environment          Must be comfortable working the US business hours          Must own a PC with at least 8 GB of memory
column11: Relationship management, Administration, Project management, Social media, Healthcare, Market research, WiFi, CRM, Logistics, Salesforce

column2: The Marketing Specialist is responsible for the execution of multi-channel marketing campaigns to help the marketing leads achieve or exceed commercial strategic goals for the global conferences within a culture focused on results, accountability, relevance, innovation, quality, and speed to market.                    ?         What you will need:             Work with the Marketing leads in executing end-to-end marketing campaigns to drive audience acquisition revenue and retention across the global conference portfolio         Plan the campaign activities assigned to you based on the set-back schedule to deliver marketing campaigns - on time, to budget.          Execute the campaigns effectively making sure that the campaign activities are well tracked and are seamlessly executed as per agreed planned in collaboration with the relevant stakeholders and marketing leads         Optimize the processes and look at innovative ways of optimizing the existing process, create and follow best practices to maintain high quality standards, and have a positive impact on campaigns.          Utilize analytical tools to inform and identify the best channel mix and utilization to achieve commercial and strategic goals and the best possible ROI on campaign spend         Effectively manage internal external stakeholders/partners    to deliver campaigns       Be agile and flexible to deliver the best possible result and have a positive commercial impact on the global portfolios.         Make sure you are working as a part of the team, both regionally and globally to help achieve the larger marketing teams objectives.                 What you will need:             bachelors degree preferred; MBA is a plus          2-5 years experience in Marketing, with direct experience in marketing operations and/or working with the marketing center of excellence in the business to business environment         Experience and skills within integrated, multi-channel marketing         Experience and skills of SEO, SEM, marketing analytics, CMS and demand generation campaigns         Experience and skills in marketing automation and database driven marketing         Understanding of deriving, analyzing and utilizing customer insight         Strong time management and project management skills including the ability to manage multiple projects and meet tight deadlines         Strong written/oral communication skills               What you will get:          Competitive salary, generous paid time off policy, charity match program, and more!     Group Medical Insurance, Parental Leave, Employee Assistance Program (EAP)     Collaborative, team-oriented culture that embraces diversity      Professional development and unlimited growth opportunities

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Project Manager to join our dynamic marketing team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing and executing various marketing projects with a focus on trade marketing, exhibitions, and Point of Purchase (POP) materials. The candidate should have a solid understanding of marketing principles, excellent vendor management skills, and strong communication abilities. Key Responsibilities: Trade Marketing and Exhibition Management: Develop and implement trade marketing strategies to promote our products and services within targeted markets. Plan, coordinate, and execute exhibitions, trade shows, and industry events to showcase our brand and offerings. Collaborate with internal teams and external partners to create engaging booth designs, promotional materials, and interactive experiences for exhibition attendees. Understanding of Marketing Principles: Utilize a deep understanding of marketing principles to develop comprehensive project plans, strategies, and campaigns. Conduct market research and analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and competitive landscapes. Align marketing initiatives with business objectives to drive brand awareness, customer engagement, and sales growth. Understanding of Point of Purchase (POP) Materials: Manage the creation, production, and distribution of Point of Purchase (POP) materials, including displays, signage, and promotional materials. Ensure POP materials are strategically placed and effectively communicate key messages to target audiences. Monitor the performance of POP materials and make data-driven adjustments to optimize effectiveness. Vendor Management: Identify, evaluate, and onboard vendors and suppliers for marketing projects and initiatives. Negotiate contracts, pricing, and terms with vendors to ensure cost-effective and high-quality deliverables. Maintain strong relationships with vendors and oversee the fulfillment of project requirements according to agreed-upon timelines and specifications. Good Communication Skills: Serve as the primary point of contact for internal stakeholders, external partners, and vendors, providing clear and timely communication throughout project lifecycles. Facilitate cross-functional collaboration and alignment among team members to ensure project success. Present project plans, progress updates, and performance metrics to key stakeholders in a professional and engaging manner. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field. Master's degree preferred. Proven experience (X years) in project management within the marketing or advertising industry. Strong understanding of marketing principles, trade marketing strategies, and exhibition management. Proficiency in vendor management, negotiation, and contract administration. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to convey complex ideas clearly and effectively. Highly organized with strong attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously. Proficiency in project management tools and software (e.g., Asana, Trello, Microsoft Project). Demonstrated ability to thrive in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment while maintaining a positive attitude and fostering teamwork.
column11: POP, Go-to-market Strategy, Trade Marketing, Vendor Management, Gtm, Product Marketing, Product Launch, Marketing Planning, Product Planning

column2: This is the most important, visible, and fast-growing role at the company. The future of our growth depends on a successful and scalable implementation of a strong Affiliate and Influencer community program - complete with onboarding, training, campaigns, daily communication, and incentives. Affiliate Community Manager Success Scorecard :  >20 Affiliates trained and onboarded per week (TikTok and GoAffPro) # new content produced and posted per week (videos, posts, etc) # of compliance issues  # of affiliates contacted 1:1 per week $ revenue per influencer (as a percentage of total influencers)  % of active Affiliates, as measured by tagged videos What Success Looks Like: Revenue Growth via Affiliates : Drive sales and revenue via affiliates, influencers, and content creators, consistently increasing revenue generated through affiliate links and influencer promotions (cross-platform). Expansion of Affiliate Network : Continuously grow the and educate the affiliate network, onboarding new influencers regularly and keeping existing affiliates engaged and active. High Quality Affiliate Content and Conversion Rates : cultivate relationships with affiliates and influencers who produce content that resonates with their audiences, resulting in high engagement rates and conversion rates. Affiliate Motivation and Incentives : Increase affiliate engagement through incentives, promotions, rewards, and other structured programs. Affiliate Compliance Monitoring : Ensure that all influencers and content creators adhere to compliance guidelines and represent the brand positively, protecting its reputation and maintaining trust with customers. Monthly Affiliate Campaigns : Runing end-to-end monthly Affiliate campaigns and contests to improve content production, click-through rates, conversion rates, and ROI Affiliate Community Management : Building strong, positive relationships with influencers and content creators 1:1 (email, SMS, WhatsApp) and as a group / community (Discord, Slack, etc) to share best practices, campaign updates, incentives, and create a sense of community.  Trend Analysis and Best Practice Identification : Stay current in trends, hashtags, music, best practices, platform changes, and evolving consumer expectations, adapting the affiliate/influencer program accordingly to remain effective and competitive. Daily and Weekly Affiliate Communication : Clear and effective communication via email, newsletters (Klaviyo), with influencers, internal teams, and external partners to ensure alignment on goals, expectations, and campaign strategies. Primary Role Objectives: Establish and run a formal, scalable, and effective Affiliate  onboarding and support program  to onboard, train, motivate, and support affiliates who support the brand via content creation (via Upfluence, Euka.ai, TikTok Open Collab, and other tools) Build and operate an  ongoing communications, training, support, and incentive program  to keep Affiliates engaged and producing content. Distributing samples, developing ongoing Klaviyo emails, monthly Affiliate meetings and trainings, research sharing, community portal, etc.  Support Affiliate  relationships via "Tiers"  with the most critical and high performing affiliates receiving white glove??treatment (weekly check-ins, content support, content boosting, etc) and other tiers receiving appropriate support to encourage growth. Regular Role Activities : Identify high performing TikTok content and best practices to disseminate these to other affiliates and ??oost??content via paid ads (ie: Spark Ads) to ensure the best content is being produced and popularized. Support Targeted and Open Collab opportunities on TikTok Manage monthly Affiliate payouts and notices via GoAffPro Research new Affiliate management tool opportunities  Support Affiliate sample requests and associated follow-ups Results tacking, scorecard management, and communication ??both internally and externally with Affiliates  Weekly performance check-ins with the team Collect and recommend content to boost via TikTok Spark Ads  Affiliate ??ustomer support????answering questions, providing guidance, troubleshooting  Affiliate communications ??incentivizing, encouraging, and ensuring ongoing engagement and strong relationships Key Skills: Communication  - Excellent written and verbal English communication skills Relationship building  - Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with influencers (communication, negotiation skills, and empathy) Marketing  - Understanding of influencer marketing trends, best practices, and platforms (including TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, etc) Analytical skills  ??ability to read, interpret, and act on data from various platforms Creative Problem-Solving  - troubleshooting issues, optimizing campaigns, taking advantage of emerging opportunities Project Management  - setting timelines, managing budgets, and collaboration  Compliance knowledge  ??to help keep us within FTC and FDA guidelines  Attention to Detail  - managing contracts, tracking affiliate commissions, and ensuring accuracy in campaign reporting Passion for the cause  ??nutrition, health, supplements  People Contacts and Interactions CEO ??weekly meetings to coordinate priorities and progress Affiliates ??direct contact with current and perspective affiliates on a daily basis Mandatory Meetings: Once-weekly 60 minute check-in to review activities, unblock challenges, plan investments. L-10 format (from EOS) Once or twice-weekly 30 minute check-ins : ??tand up??format where we discuss the top 3 items completed, and the top 3 items to be done  Key Tools: Klaviyo TikTok Shop  TikTok Affiliate center TikTok Ads GoAffPro Upfluence  Shopify Google Analytics If this sounds like an interesting opportunity for you, please send us an email at admin@naturalcurelabs.com (or via this platform), and be sure to use "Scale Content Creators" as the subject line of your message. Thank you.
column11: English, TikTok, Affiliate, Content Creation, Affiliate Marketing, Email Marketing, Influencer Marketing

column2: Job description About Company: Established in 2004, situated in one of the largest neighbourhoods in Pune, Infedis Diagnostic Centre in Somwar Peth is a part of the integrated network of pathology labs. This venture embarked on its journey with a longstanding commitment and a vision to make a wide range of specialized testing services available to the common man. The centre is well equipped with the latest in technological advancements and automation and adhere to the various stringent internal and external quality control mechanisms. Be it for routine screening procedures or for more specialised or advanced assays, choose from a plethora of diagnostic tests. Job Description: The Field MR will be responsible for medical sales, communication, customer service, and knowledge of medicine and pharmacy products. The Field MR will be working with medical professionals to identify products to meet healthcare needs. Qualifications Medical Sales and Communication skills Customer Service skills Knowledge of Medicine and Pharmacy products Bachelor's or Masters degree in Pharmacy, Medicine, or related field Experience in medical sales or related fields is a plus Excellent interpersonal and communication skills Ability to work independently and remotely Additional language proficiency is a plus Experience : Freshers Gender Preference - Male Shift : Mon to Sat, 10am to 8pm

column2: We are seeking an experienced and talented Digital Marketing Specialist to join our dynamic marketing team. As a Digital Marketing Specialist, you will play a crucial role in developing and implementing digital marketing strategies to drive brand awareness, generate leads, and increase online engagement. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 3 years of experience in digital marketing, with a strong background in SEO, SMO, PPC, Google Ads, and other digital marketing channels.  Role & responsibilities Develop and execute effective digital marketing strategies to achieve company objectives and targets. Conduct thorough keyword research and analysis to optimize website content for search engine visibility and rankings. column1: Hiring Brand Marketing & Loyalty - Antara (Max Group) Gurugram
column2: About the Organization  Who we are? Max Group is a leading Indian multi-business conglomerate with interests in the Life Insurance, Healthcare, Real Estate and Senior Care industries. Launched in 2013, Antara is a 100% subsidiary of Max India. It is pioneering the concept of Age in Place for people over 55 years of age, by developing Senior Living communities in India. The first Antara community was launched in April 2017 near Dehradun, Uttarakhand with 190 apartments spread over 14 acres of land. After our first one-of-its-kind, independent residential community at Dehradun and another at Noida, Sector-150. We are set to scale up further and carry forward the Max Group legacy of holistic care solutions with the launch of Antara Care Homes and Antara Care at Home services.    Job Title Brand Marketing & Loyalty    Job Summary The Brand Marketing & Loyalty Manager will play a pivotal role in developing and executing strategies to elevate brand awareness, establish brand identity, and drive customer loyalty for AGEasy By Antara. You will be responsible for crafting a compelling brand narrative, managing marketing campaigns across various channels, and implementing initiatives to foster a strong customer base. Responsibilities Develop and implement a comprehensive brand marketing strategy that aligns with      AGEasy By Antara's overall business objectives. Conduct market research to understand customer needs, preferences, and competitor      landscape. Define and manage brand identity, including brand messaging, positioning, and visual communication. Create and execute marketing campaigns across various channels (digital, social media, influencer marketing, etc.) to drive brand awareness, engagement, and lead generation. Manage brand assets, including brand guidelines, logo usage, and marketing collateral. Develop and implement customer loyalty programs to build long-term relationships  and encourage repeat purchases. Analyse marketing campaign performance and measure ROI to identify areas for      improvement. Stay up to date on industry trends and best practices in brand marketing and customer loyalty. Qualifications Bachelors degree in marketing, Communications, or a related field. Minimum of 5 years of experience in brand marketing, preferably within the D2C or      healthcare sector. Proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing campaigns across various channels. Strong understanding of customer loyalty principles and experience in implementing loyalty programs. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Creativity and a passion for storytelling to craft compelling brand narratives. Excellent communication, written and verbal, skills. Proficiency in marketing automation tools and data analysis platforms.  Interested Candidates can share their resume on rajkumari@antaraseniorcare.com or WhatsApp your resume on 7053490016.

column1: Job Opening Motion Graphic Designer , Hyderabad, To-Increase PVT Ltd
column2: At To-Increase, we see motion graphic design as visual storytelling videos that engages, informs, and inspires. The ideal candidate will have expert knowledge of current design software and be skilled in every step of the design process, from concept to final deliverable. Collaborating with multiple teams across the company, the graphic designer should be able to take written or spoken ideas and convert them into a design that connects. The successful candidate will have a thorough understanding of branding and marketing, and be able to find the right style and layout for every project. As a motion graphic designer, your primary role is to create engaging visual content that combines graphic design elements with animation to communicate messages, tell stories, and evoke emotions. Job Requirements: Collaborate with marketing teams to grasp project objectives, target audience, and key messages. From there, develop concepts and ideas for motion graphics that align with the project's goals. Utilize software such as Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, or similar tools to create visual designs, encompassing typography, illustrations, and graphic elements. Ensure designs are visually appealing and effectively convey the intended message. Develop the sequence of events or scenes in storyboarding to guide the animation process and maintain a cohesive narrative flow. Work closely with content creators and subject matter experts (SMEs) to incorporate feedback and revisions throughout the design and animation process, ensuring the final product meets their expectations and objectives. As a motion graphic designer, maintain high-quality standards in your work, including attention to detail, consistency in design elements, and adherence to brand guidelines. Engage in a wide range of projects and media, using various software programs to visualize and develop innovative graphic designs that meet business goals. Solicit input from managers to ensure designs meet organizational standards and brand expectations, accurately express ideas, and represent the company or client appropriately. Work independently as well as cooperatively with the marketing team to meet deadlines and schedule project implementation based on workload. Evaluate existing processes, identify flaws, and devise solutions to improve design capabilities. Update and maintain internal databases for designs, types of assets, and videos. What You Need to Be Successful (Minimum Qualifications) Minimum of 5-10 years of pertinent experience in motion graphic designing, encompassing corporate videos and explainer videos. Education  Completion of any full-time design course/degree. Extensive proficiency in Adobe After Effects and Premiere projects. Strong command of design software, including Illustrator, InDesign, and Photoshop. Good communication skills. Familiarity with Microsoft PowerPoint and Word. Strong organizational and time-management skills to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Motivation to continuously enhance skill set through education and training.

column2: Job Title:  Content Writer Experience:  2-5 years Location:  M.G Road, Agra Job Type:  Full-time Job Description: We are seeking a talented and experienced Content Writer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for creating compelling and engaging content across various platforms. As a Content Writer, you will play a key role in developing and maintaining the voice and tone of our brand through written communication. Key Responsibilities: 1.  Content Creation: Develop high-quality and unique content for various channels, including website, blogs, social media, email campaigns, and marketing collateral. Conduct thorough research to ensure accuracy and relevance of content. 2.  Content Strategy: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content strategies that align with business goals and target audience. 3.  Editing and Proofreading: Edit and proofread content to ensure clarity, consistency, and adherence to brand guidelines. 4.  Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, design, and product development, to gather information and insights for content creation. 5.  Stay Updated: Stay abreast of industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging technologies to enhance the relevance and effectiveness of our content. Qualifications: 1.  Educational Background: Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, Communications, or a related field. 2.  Experience: Proven experience as a Content Writer with a portfolio of published articles and/or content. 3.  Writing Skills: Exceptional writing, editing, and proofreading skills with a keen eye for detail. 4.  Creativity: Strong creative thinking and problem-solving skills with the ability to generate innovative ideas. 5.  Adaptability: Ability to adapt writing style to different audiences and platforms. 6.  Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Interested candidates may share their resume at  recruitment@oswaalbooks.com / hrlead@oswaalbooks.com

column2: We are seeking a results-driven and creative Digital Marketing Specialist to join our team and help us achieve our marketing goals and objectives. Role Description : This is a full-time on-site role for a Digital Marketing Specialist located in Gwalior. The Digital Marketing Specialist will be responsible for day-to-day tasks such as social media marketing, digital marketing, web analytics, online marketing, and communication. Your role will encompass a wide range of digital channels and strategies, with the primary goal of increasing brand awareness, driving traffic, and generating leads. Key Responsibilities : Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies to drive online traffic and engagement. Manage and optimize our website to ensure it is user-friendly, visually appealing, and effectively converts visitors into leads or customers. Plan and execute paid advertising campaigns (Google Ads, Facebook Ads, etc.) to increase visibility and conversions. Monitor and analyze the performance of digital marketing campaigns using tools like Google Analytics and make data-driven improvements. Manage and nurture email marketing campaigns, ensuring the delivery of relevant and engaging content to subscribers. Assist in the creation of product listings, including product descriptions, images, and pricing. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and consumer preferences to adapt the product selection strategy accordingly. Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging digital marketing technologies.

column2: Job Description: We are in search of a meticulous and detail-oriented individual to join our team as a Full-Time CRM Executive. The primary focus of this role revolves around the effective management of customer relationship data to drive targeted marketing initiatives and enhance overall customer experience. Key Responsibilities: 1. CRM Data Management:  Gather and authenticate customer data to ensure accuracy and reliability.  Maintain and update our CRM databases with utmost precision, adhering to strict data management protocols.  Implement robust data validation processes to uphold data integrity and authenticity.  Organize and segment customer data for tailored marketing campaigns and personalized communications. 2. Marketing Strategy Implementation:  Leverage CRM data insights to develop and execute targeted marketing campaigns.  Craft personalized marketing messages and content tailored to specific customer segments.  Analyze campaign performance metrics to refine marketing strategies and optimize customer engagement.  Utilize data-driven decision-making to enhance the effectiveness of marketing initiatives. 3. Email Marketing:  Create and schedule marketing emails based on CRM data parameters, ensuring relevance and authenticity.  Monitor email campaign performance metrics and make necessary adjustments to enhance engagement and conversion rates.  Stay abreast of industry trends to continuously refine email marketing strategies while safeguarding customer data integrity and security. Requirements:  Female candidates based out of Gurgaon are preferred.  2-3 years of relevant experience in CRM management is preferred.  Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.  Demonstrated expertise in data management, particularly in a customer-centric context.  Proficiency in CRM platforms and adeptness in data entry techniques.  Strong analytical skills with the ability to derive actionable insights from data.  Excellent written and verbal communication skills.  Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively in a dynamic work environment.   Additional Information: This position offers the opportunity to work in a dynamic and collaborative environment where creativity and innovation are valued. The successful candidate will have the chance to make a significant impact on our marketing efforts and contribute to the growth and success of our company.

column2: Role & responsibilities     Develop, execute, and manage paid advertising campaigns across platforms such as Youtube ads, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads, and other relevant channels. Conduct thorough market  research to identify target audiences, competitors, and industry trends to      inform campaign strategies. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to define campaign objectives, budgets, and KPIs. Perform keyword research, ad copywriting, and A/B testing to optimize campaign performance and drive high-quality traffic. Monitor campaign performance,      analyze data, and generate regular reports to measure the effectiveness of campaigns against established goals. Utilize analytics tools and      conversion tracking to identify opportunities for improvement and make data-driven decisions. Stay up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends, best practices, and industry developments to enhance campaign performance and suggest innovative ideas. Collaborate with the creative team to develop engaging and impactful ad creatives, landing pages, and other assets. Ensure compliance with advertising policies and guidelines set by respective platforms. Monitor industry trends and competitors' activities to identify emerging opportunities and potential threats. Preferred candidate profile   Bachelor's degree in Marketing,  Advertising, Business, or a related field. Proven experience of 1 to 2 years in planning, managing, and optimizing paid advertising campaigns. In-depth knowledge and hands-on experience with platforms such as Google Ads, Facebook Ads Manager, Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads, etc. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data, generate insights, and make data-driven decisions. Proficient in using analytics tools such as Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, or similar platforms. Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to craft compelling ad copy and      effectively communicate campaign performance to stakeholders. Creative mindset with the  ability to develop engaging and impactful ad creatives. Strong organizational skills with the ability to manage multiple campaigns and meet deadlines. Self-motivated and proactive, with a passion for digital marketing and staying updated with industry  trends. Knowledge of building landing pages, SEO, content marketing, and social media marketing is a plus. Perks and benefits   Job Type: Full-time Pay: 12,000.00 - 25,000.00 per month Work Schedule: Night shift (USA Timings) Ability to commute/relocate: Basheerbagh, Hyderabad, Telangana: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred) Experience: 1 year (Preferred) Work Location: In person

Key Responsibilities:  - Generate and maintain comprehensive MIS reports for the Sales & Marketing department. - Coordinate data collection with Unit SPOCs and ensure end-to-end data reconciliation. - Extract data from various business software/applications and prepare monthly KPI reports. - Identify areas for process improvement and implement analytical solutions. - Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure timely data collection and reporting. - Assist in customer engagement activities through SMS campaigns. - Liaise with SMS vendors for timely execution of campaigns. - Prepare specialized data reports for monthly reviews and ad-hoc requests. - Provide Salesforce support to Sales & Marketing team users. - Handle ERP processes such as raising CERs and vendor invoice verification. - Ensure compliance with DLT approval and SMS platform regulations. Key Performance Indicators: - Zero errors in MIS reporting. - 100% compliance with MIS reporting timelines. He/she will support and improve the quality of Muktangans growing donor reporting portfolio. This includes gathering of information, consolidation, editing, as well as layout and branding of all required reports, which include donor reports, specific thematic reports and consolidated emergency reports.
