column2: Role & responsibilities   As a Customer Relationship Manager at our company, you will play a crucial role in providing exceptional customer service to our clients and vendors. You will serve as the primary point of contact, ensuring seamless communication and coordination between clients and service providers to meet their needs efficiently and effectively. If you are organized, detail-oriented, and possess strong interpersonal skills, we invite you to join our team and contribute to our commitment to excellence in client satisfaction. Client Communication: Serve as the main point of contact for clients, responding promptly to inquiries, providing updates on service requests, and addressing any concerns or issues with professionalism and empathy. Work Order Management: Utilize our company's work order management system to create, prioritize, and manage work orders accurately, reflecting the client's requested services and urgency level. Coordinate with vendors to ensure timely fulfillment of service requests. Vendor Coordination: Identify vendors whose expertise aligns with client needs, dispatch vendors accordingly, and provide them with detailed work requests/purchase orders specifying scope of work, terms, and conditions. Schedule and follow up with vendors to ensure timely completion of services, while ensuring adherence to client and company protocols. Client Satisfaction: Proactively monitor service calls and follow up with clients to ensure their satisfaction with provided services. Address any issues or concerns promptly and work to resolve disputes in a timely manner. Documentation and Record-Keeping: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records in the work order management system, documenting service details, conversations, status changes, and any other relevant information. Obtain and maintain necessary documentation to support client invoicing. Team Collaboration: Collaborate effectively with internal teams, including billing and other departments, to ensure seamless processing of work orders and timely invoicing. Communicate any relevant information or updates to facilitate efficient workflow across teams. Continuous Improvement: Proactively identify potential issues or areas for improvement in service delivery and work to address them promptly. Seek opportunities to streamline processes and enhance client satisfaction through effective communication and problem-solving. Preferred candidate profile   Bachelors degree.  Minimum of 3 - 5 years of related experience in customer service, client coordination, or administrative roles.  Language fluency in English and Hindi.  Strong organizational and clerical skills, including data entry and document organization.  Basic computational skills for calculations such as proportions, percentages, and discounts.  Ability to prioritize workload and focus on tasks with significant impact.  Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to interact professionally with clients and vendors.  Customer-service oriented attitude with a friendly and helpful demeanor.  Comfortable with handling phone calls and making outbound calls.  Eagerness to learn new tasks and take on additional responsibilities in a fast-paced environment.   Pls call- 92893 85294
column11: Client Communication, Team Collaboration, Documentation and Record-Keeping, Continuous Improvement, Work Order Management, Vendor Coordination, Client Satisfaction

column2: Greetings from MarketStar!! Role: Influencer Marketing Specialist  Experience: 3-5 years Location: Hyderabad/ Bangalore Language: English & Hindi Shift Timings: India -10am to 6pm IST Market: Domestic Office-optional  Looking for Influencer Marketing Experience Candidate.  Roles and Responsibilities: The job role for an influencer marketing specialist with sales experience focused on selling packages of reels and social media posts for small businesses, such as restaurants typically involves: Prospecting & Lead Generation  - Identifying potential clients particularly small businesses interested in enhancing their social media presence through reels and social media posts that could benefit from influencer marketing services. Outreach & Relationship Building  - Initiating contact with potential clients through various channels such as cold calls, emails and networking events. Building and nurturing relationships to understand their needs and pain points.  Consultative Selling  - Conducting consultations with prospective clients to assess their social media goals, target audience and content needs.  Presentation & Proposal - Presenting the influencers marketing packages in a compelling manner, highlighting the benefits of influencer marketing, emphasizing the value of reels and social media posts in driving engagement and conversions and potential ROI for the business. Negotiation  : Negotiating terms, pricing and deliverables to ensure a mutually beneficial partnership between the influencer and the small business, overcoming objections and addressing concerns. Closing Sales  - Securing agreements and closing sales by addressing any concerns, objections or questions, objections or questions from the small businesses.   Key Requirements: 1. Minimum 3 to 5 years of influencer marketing experience with a blend of sales and digital marketing skills.  2. Understanding of social media platforms, knowledge of how platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Tik Tok etc operate and their specific features (e.g., reels, posts and stories) 3. Influencer marketing expertise, understanding the dynamics of influencer marketing, including identifying suitable influencers, negotiation tactics and campaign management.  4. Understanding of content creation best practices across digital platforms. 5. Excellent communication and negotiation skills. Qualifications: 1. A bachelors degree in Sales & Marketing/Business Studies or other related areas  2. Minimum of sales knowledge on social media platforms.  3. Digital Marketing and Influencer Marketing Skills. 4. Previous experience in digital marketing, social media management, influencer marketing or related fields, this could include full time/freelance work in social media marketing or influencer outreach. Interested candidate please share your resume to email - sujatha.sirigiri@marketstar.com  HR Sujata S

column2: As an MSME (Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises) Fundraising Officer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing fundraising strategies to secure financial support for MSME projects and initiatives     You will work closely with internal and external stakeholders, including MSME owners, government agencies, donors, and partners, to identify fundraising opportunities, cultivate relationships, and drive fundraising efforts     You will also be responsible for monitoring and evaluating the effectiveness of fundraising campaigns and reporting on progress to management             ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:           Fundraising Strategy:    Develop and implement fundraising strategies aligned with the organizations goals and objectives, including identifying potential donors, cultivating relationships, and soliciting funds from various sources such as individuals, corporations, foundations, and government agencies.           Relationship Management:    Cultivate and maintain relationships with potential and existing donors, partners, and other stakeholders to build trust and rapport, and promote ongoing support for MSME projects and initiatives. Collaborate with other teams within the organization to ensure a coordinated approach to fundraising efforts.           Proposal Development:    Prepare compelling fundraising proposals, grant applications, and other fundraising materials that clearly communicate the organizations mission, programs, and impact. Customize proposals to meet the specific requirements of different donors and funding opportunities.           Donor Stewardship   : Implement effective donor stewardship practices, including timely acknowledgment of donations, regular communication updates, and recognition of donor contributions. Build long-term relationships with donors to foster repeat giving and donor loyalty.           Fundraising Events:    Plan, coordinate, and execute fundraising events, such as donor receptions, fundraising galas, and other fundraising initiatives. Coordinate logistics, manage invitations, track RSVPs, and ensure smooth event execution.           Monitoring and Reporting:    Track and report on the progress of fundraising campaigns, including donor engagement, revenue targets, and expenses. Evaluate the effectiveness of fundraising strategies and recommend adjustments as needed to achieve fundraising goals.           Compliance and Record Keeping:    Ensure compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and organizational policies related to fundraising and donor management. Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of donor interactions, gifts, and acknowledgments in the organizations donor management system.         QUALIFICATION EXPERIENCE:         Any Bachelors degree, in marketing, communications, or a related field.         Proven experience in fundraising, donor relations, or sales, preferably in the non-profit or MSME sector.         Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to craft compelling fundraising proposals and communicate with diverse stakeholders.         Strong relationship management skills with the ability to cultivate and maintain relationships with donors, partners, and other stakeholders.         Results-oriented mindset with the ability to set and achieve fundraising targets and meet deadlines.         Excellent organizational skills with attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple tasks and priorities.         Familiarity with fundraising tools and technologies, including donor management systems, fundraising platforms, and social media platforms.         Knowledge of the MSME sector and related fundraising opportunities is a plus.         Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a collaborative and cooperative approach.           SKILLS COMPETENCIES:         Communication skills:    Able to articulate and communicate well to all stakeholders (both verbally and in writing) in a manner that meets the requirement       Language skills:    Good command of English, Hindi one regional language (Verbally).       Research skills:    Identify potential prospects from untapped locations, corporate individuals.       Team Management Collaboration / People skills: Result-focused    and driven to meet ambitious monthly, quarterly and yearly targets       Strategic Thinking and Analysis:    identify the potential location for fundraising, filter prospect base and filter potential leads, set up meetings       Change Management:    Good time management and ability to work to tight deadlines. Willingness to work odd hours (if necessary).       Operational excellence (Project / Program / Process management):    Team player

column1: Manager CRM (Salesforce) Email Marketing - Overseas Education
column2: Working in a marketing team of experienced CRM experts, and reporting to the Senior CRM Manager based in London with a dotted line to the Regional Director in India Sitting in the heart of the Content and Marketing team, and working side-by-side with the CRM Team which is based in London, you will work with a warm, welcoming, and highly ambitious team, amid a wide-scale digital transformation. The CRM Comms Executive will work in a team of experienced CRM experts, and report to the Senior CRM Manager with a dotted line to the Regional Director. Hands-on execution of email and CRM marketing campaigns. Gathering requirements will include defining the target audience, understanding the aims of the campaign, and agreeing on the key messages and timing. The practical campaign execution will involve looking at the data, pulling the relevant contacts to build the lists, creating the email template, and building and testing HTML emails in Salesforce Marketing Cloud. Improve email marketing campaigns whether its tweaking copy so that its more appealing or engaging for our customers or making modifications in the look and feel of our emails to encourage better response. Increasing the automation of emails so customers get a more consistent flow of information will also be a key area for development and one where you'll really be able to make your mark. Key responsibilities: Working alongside the CRM Comms team in taking briefings from internal stakeholders (product marketing experts, market managers, admissions and accommodation teams), defining the target audience, understanding the aims of the messages, and agreeing with timing. Creating, maintaining, and standardizing including B2B and B2C event announcements, reminders, admissions comms, and other ad-hoc business updates. Hands-on content creation of CRM messages, writing the content, and designing the pieces to make sure that the message adheres to the briefing and email marketing best practices. Managing the review and approval process of produced email comms, making sure that feedback is managed and circulated through all stakeholders guaranteeing a consistent message. Assisting with monitoring and analysis of the results and data insights of all marketing communications to recommend and implement changes accordingly. Assisting with automation efforts carried out by the CRM Comms team. Assisting with all the GDPR compliance efforts for CRM communications Candidate Profile: To be considered for the role, you will need to be a marketer who has already specialized in email/CRM and is looking for a new challenge with a strong technical grasp in Salesforce Marketing Cloud, or other similar market-leading CRM marketing automation platforms. You will be good at asking the right questions to take a full, detailed brief and someone who can build rapport and trust easily. You'll be logical and methodical in your approach to campaigns, quick to grasp new systems, and able to analyze and spot meaningful patterns in data. Your ability to create campaigns that work will come from a combination of gut instinct and effective use of analytics. Copywriting would also be a real plus and so would basic HTML knowledge. Working on KPIs is something you'll be used to doing and you may even have experience setting marketing KPIs for campaigns or initiatives you have worked on. To get the best out of our email software, youll either already know the system or be someone who can really demonstrate the determination needed to master technology tools and use them to maximum benefit. Lastly, to thrive in our team and company, you will be someone who will want to learn about the wider business. Our working environment: Our colleagues are from more than 50 countries, speak dozens of languages, and enjoy working in a multinational, multicultural business environment. We are active fund-raisers for Plan International, our partner charity, and highly engaged in our staff well-being and inclusion with support and discussion groups such as inclusivity in recruitment, career development, and progression as well as LGBTQIA+ Network.    How To Apply? Copy and Paste the below link in your browser to apply online on The Search House : https://recruitcrm.io/apply/16897619863500030302iZw

column2: Role & responsibilities     Company : JAG Aviation Venture:  OFLY Aviation Awareness Campaign Location:  Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh (On-site) Position Type:  Full-time Responsibilities: Overview : As a Marketing and Social Media Associate, you'll play a pivotal role in crafting and executing digital marketing strategies while also managing the company's social media presence. You'll collaborate closely with the marketing team to create compelling content, engage with our audience, analyze data, and contribute to overall branding efforts across various platforms. Responsibilities: Content Creation: Develop diverse and engaging content for social media platforms and marketing campaigns, including text, graphics, and videos, tailored to different target audiences and platforms. Community Engagement: Actively engage with our audience across social media channels, responding to comments, messages, and mentions promptly and professionally to foster a positive community atmosphere. Social Media Management: Schedule and publish posts using social media management tools, ensuring consistency in messaging and branding. Monitor trends and adjust strategies to optimize performance. Campaign Support: Assist in the planning and execution of marketing campaigns, integrating social media components to maximize reach and impact. Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure alignment with broader marketing objectives. Analytics and Reporting: Monitor and analyze social media and marketing campaign performance metrics, preparing regular reports with actionable insights to refine strategies and improve results. Marketing Support: Provide support for various marketing initiatives, including email marketing, content creation, SEO optimization, and other digital marketing efforts as needed. Stay Updated: Stay informed about the latest trends, tools, and best practices in social media marketing and digital marketing. Share insights and recommendations with the team to enhance strategies and stay ahead of the curve. Requirements: Zeal for Marketing, Communications, or a related field preferred. Creativity: Strong creative skills with the ability to develop engaging content that resonates with different audiences across various platforms. Communication Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Ability to interact professionally with followers, team members, and external stakeholders. Analytical Skills: Proficiency in analyzing social media and marketing performance metrics, with the ability to derive actionable insights to inform decision-making and strategy optimization. Tech-Savvy: Familiarity with social media platforms and their features. Basic graphic design skills and knowledge of photo/video editing software are advantageous. Adaptability: Ability to adapt to changing priorities and thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Perks and benefits   Work timings are Monday to Friday at Office.  48 hours a week.  Monthly one paid leave along with annual bonus and one team outing.  Performance based out of turn incentives.

column2: Role: Associate Manager, Content Marketing  About Odessa: Odessa is a U.S. company with offices across the globe. Our leasing solutions power a client base  comprised of leading global financial institutions that operate across market segments. We transform  bold ideas into breakthrough outcomes for clients that drive the economy through equipment and fleet  leasing: IT, healthcare, transportation and more. We believe that great outcomes and customer satisfaction are everything. Its what drives us to turn bold  ideas into transformational solutions for lease and loan management. By combining digital technologies  with what works across a diverse customer base, we use an agile approach to co-innovate with clients to  help them solve their toughest problems. As the largest technology provider in the leasing industry, Odessa provides a feature-rich ERP solution  with broad integrations across top CRM, G/L, tax, credit, and leading enablement applications.  As a  complete Platform, Odessa delivers a total solution for commercial lending companies, driving the future  of asset finance. With best-in-class functionality, extensible architecture and a suite of value-added  features and services, Odessa helps companies transform their business operations.  Primary role:  Odessa is seeking a talented and creative Content Writer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate  will have a passion for storytelling, an eye for detail, and the ability to craft compelling content across  various platforms. As a Content Writer, you will be responsible for producing high-quality written  materials that align with our brand voice and drive engagement with our target audience.  What you'll do:   ??Content Creation: Write, edit, and proofread content for a variety of formats including blogs,  articles, social media posts, website content, emails, newsletters, and marketing materials.  ??Research: Conduct thorough research on industry-related topics to generate ideas for new  content and ensure the accuracy and relevance of the information.  ??SEO Optimization: Utilize SEO best practices to optimize content for search engines and  increase organic traffic. ??Brand Consistency: Maintain consistency in brand tone, style, and messaging across all written  materials. ??Content Strategy: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content strategies that align  with business goals and target audience needs. ??Performance Tracking: Monitor and analyze the performance of content using analytics tools  and adjust strategies as needed to improve engagement and reach. ??Collaboration: Work closely with graphic designers, marketing professionals, and other team  members to produce cohesive and effective content.  Basic qualifications & skills:  ??Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, Communications, Marketing, or a related field.  ??8-12 years of experience as a Content Writer, Copywriter, or similar role.  ??Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills.  ??Strong research skills and the ability to quickly grasp complex topics.  ??Familiarity with SEO best practices and tools (e.g., Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs).  ??Strong sense of visual design   ??Ability to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.  ??Creative thinking and a keen eye for detail.  ??Experience with content marketing and strategy.  ??Knowledge of content trends and optimizing content strategy   ??Ability to create content in various formats.  Our commitment to you:  ??Your entrepreneurial spirit and vision will fuel opportunities for career advancement.  ??You'll make a difference for some pretty impressive brands; Odessa serves many of the world's  leading financial institutions and manufacturers.  ??Opportunities for regular learning through training, assignments, and collaboration with experts  across the company  ??Exposure to a leading FinTech solution and the latest applications of technology in the world of  financial services  ??You'll gain access to a dynamic industry, worth more than $1.2 Trillion in the United States  alone; check out resources on the North American and global market

column2: Company Details DesignX helps manufacturing companies to create next-generation shopfloor. Our product DFOS (Digital Factory Operating System) is a powerful combination of iBPM, RPA, IIOT & AI. It solves the complexity of legacy systems like ERP, SCADA, MES & saves a huge pile of money spent on constant incremental changes required in these systems. DFOS enables the decision-makers with live business updates on production, rejection, loss prediction & MTTA (Mean Time to Act) for a specific problem.    A content writer is responsible for creating engaging, informative, and relevant written content for various platforms, including websites, blogs, social media, and other marketing channels. They play a crucial role in shaping a company's online presence and brand identity. Here is a comprehensive job description for a content writer: Role & responsibilities   Content Creation : Produce high-quality, original, and engaging written content that aligns with the company's objectives, target audience, and brand guidelines. This includes articles, blog posts, website content, social media posts, email newsletters, product descriptions, and more. Research:  Conduct thorough research on assigned topics to gather accurate information and ensure the content is well-informed and credible. This may involve studying industry trends, competitors, and target audience preferences to create content that is relevant and appealing. Proofreading and Editing : Review and edit content for clarity, grammar, punctuation, and consistency. Ensure that all content adheres to the company's style guidelines and maintains a consistent tone of voice. Content Strategy : Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content strategies that align with the company's goals and target audience. Contribute ideas for content campaigns, promotions, and creative initiatives to enhance brand awareness and engagement. Content Management:  Maintain and update existing content to ensure accuracy, relevance, and freshness. Manage content calendars, schedules, and deadlines to ensure timely delivery of content. Stay Updated : Keep abreast of industry trends, new technologies, and emerging platforms to continually enhance content creation strategies and stay ahead of the competition. Preferred candidate profile   Proven experience as a content writer or similar role. Excellent writing and editing skills, with a strong command of grammar and punctuation. Proficiency in conducting online research and synthesizing information from reliable sources. Familiarity with SEO principles and best practices. Knowledge of content management systems (CMS) and basic HTML. Creativity and the ability to generate innovative ideas. Strong attention to detail and time management skills. Ability to work independently and collaborate effectively in a team environment. Adaptability to changing priorities and deadlines. Perks and benefits   Saturday WFH PF Benefits Healthy Work environment Reimbursements Working hours - 8 hours 30 minutes.   Best Regards Ms. Sangeeta Rai HRBP NRV DesignX Contact Number - 8766391384

column2: We are hiring a "Public Relations Manager"-International Business at Vadilal Industries Ltd Corporate office Ahmedabad. Location: Ahmedabad Bond : 3 Years Salary- Open for discussion. About Vadilal IB:  Vadilal Industries, a prestigious name with a rich history spanning over 115 years, stands at the forefront of the global ice creams and food market. Renowned for its innovative approach and quality products, Vadilal has established a commanding presence in numerous international markets. Committed to excellence and customer satisfaction, the company continues to expand its international reach and influence under the International Business Division, reinforcing its status as a leader in the ice creams and food industry. Job Summary: The Public Relations Manager for our International Business (IB) will play a critical role in enhancing our companys global reputation for both, IB and Vadilal Industries USA Inc (VIU). This position involves strategic management of spearheading initiatives to engage the Indian diaspora and increase brand recognition through PR and awards & accolades as well as high-level communications for our President of IB and CEO of VIU. The successful candidate will be instrumental in maintaining and elevating the status of our 115-year-old brand, which holds a dominating presence in international markets.  Job Descriptions:   Strategic PR Management for IB & VIU:  Develop and implement comprehensive PR strategies that align with the business objectives of both entities, enhancing visibility and reputation on a global scale.   Media Relations:  Build and maintain relationships with international media, ensuring that communication is effective, culturally nuanced, and consistent across diverse markets.   Content Development:  Oversee the creation of press releases, media kits, executive statements, and other communication materials tailored to domestic and international target audience.   ?? Engaging the Indian Diaspora:  Implement targeted PR tactics to connect with the Indian diaspora in their destination countries, using culturally resonant strategies.   Executive Communications:  Manage and coordinate all public relations activities for the President of IB and CEO of VIU, including preparing them for media bytes, speech writing, personal branding initiatives on professional social media platforms and other media.   Crisis Management:  Rapidly address international PR crises or negative press, collaborating closely with legal and executive teams to effectively manage communications and minimize impact.   Celebrity:  Work with branding team to leverage the appeal of the brand?? celebrity endorsers to strengthen the brand.   Event Management:  Plan and execute PR events and press releases/conferences that promote brand objectives and executive visibility.   Product Insight:  Gain a deep understanding of our products to ensure all communications reflect comprehensive product knowledge and enthusiasm.   Award Acquisition:  Proactively seek opportunities for the brand to earn prestigious awards and recognitions domestically & internationally, further establishing our legacy and leadership in the market.   Brand Language Training:  Develop and conduct training sessions for all Heads of Departments to ensure consistent and effective use of brand language internally and externally.   Performance Metrics:  Measure the effectiveness of PR campaigns and strategies, utilizing feedback to optimize future communications. Required Qualifications:  Master?? degree in public relations, Communications, Journalism, or related field.  Minimum 8-10 years of experience in public relations, with substantial experience in managing executive-level communications.  Proven track record of developing and implementing successful PR strategies in FMCG segment.  Excellent communication skills in English; additional language skills like Gujarati, Telugu etc are a plus. Preferred Skills:  Strategic thinker with a proactive approach to problem-solving.  Excellent interpersonal and networking skills.  Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple projects simultaneously.  Experience in the food industry is advantageous. Interested candidates can send their resumes on vqthr@vadilalgroup.com

column2: About the Role: As the Category Head RTD at Indobevs, you will own the P&L of the Ready to Drink category. Your core deliverables will be driving top-line growth, bottom-line performance, and achieving market leadership for the RTD portfolio. Who are you? Experience:  A dynamic professional with 3-6 Years of experience in FMCG, Alcohol, or New Age D2C Brands. Education:  Bachelors degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. MBA preferred. What You Bring to the Table:   Consumer understanding:  Strong understanding of consumer behavior, particularly among Gen Z and Millennials. Ability to identify and capitalize on emerging trends.   Commercial Acumen:  Robust commercial mindset with a focus on ROI and data-driven decision-making.   Cross-Functional Leadership:  Excellent ability to collaborate and lead various cross-functional teams, including sales, supply chain, marketing, and finance, to drive business agendas.   Executive Presence:  Strong executive presence with the capability to engage and influence leadership teams and field teams alike.   Hustler Attitude:  A proactive, go-getter attitude with a sense of urgency and a drive to achieve excellence. Never settle for suboptimal results.   Disruptive Thinking:  Innovative and disruptive mindset to implement strategies that go beyond incremental changes. Ability to think outside the box and drive significant growth, aligned with the company's ambition to grow 5X over the next five years. What You Will Do Day to Day:   Consumer Insights & research:  Stay ahead of consumer trends and harness insights to keep Indobevs at the forefront. Engage with consumers regularly and foster a consumer-first culture within the organization. Use these insights to inform product development and marketing strategies.   Category Brand Strategy:  Develop and implement a comprehensive brand strategy. Define the brand's identity, positioning, target audience, and competitive advantage in alignment with the company's overall business goals.   Market Research:  Conduct in-depth market research to understand consumer preferences, market trends, and competitor activities.    Consumer Marketing:  Build a robust brand marketing strategy to create a strong brand pull for the Indobevs RTD product line. Develop innovative and disruptive 360-degree communication campaigns, with digital and on-ground as lead mediums.   Channel Presence:  Collaborate with Trade Marketing to establish a best-in-class channel presence for the Indobevs product line.   New Product Development:  Partner with product development teams to build a pipeline of new innovative products and continuously enhance existing ones, ensuring they meet consumer demands and stay competitive.   Budget Management:  Develop and manage the marketing budget for the brand. Ensure effective allocation of resources to achieve marketing goals.   Distribution Management:  Work closely with distribution partners to ensure the availability of products in key markets and locations. Monitor inventory levels and optimize distribution channels to meet consumer demand. Performance Metrics  Revenue growth and market share in the RTD category.  ROI on marketing campaigns and initiatives.  Consumer engagement and brand loyalty metrics.  Successful launch and performance of new products.  Efficiency and effectiveness of budget management.  Improvement in channel presence and distribution efficiency. What We Offer:  Competitive salary and performance-based incentive structure  Opportunities for career advancement within a fast-growing company.  A collaborative, dynamic, innovative & fun work environment.  Comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, wellness programs, and more. Location and Travel:   Location:  Based at the Head Office in Delhi.   Travel Requirements:  Minimal travel is required, primarily for key events and meetings.

column2: Internet journalists Another small breed of Internet professionals are Internet journalists - people who develop content exclusively for a content based website. Rediff On The Net is the first Indian publication on the Internet without a corresponding print counterpart. While most publications in India put their printed content on the Internet, Rediff On The Net has a team of journalists who work exclusively to report news and write features on Rediff.com, as and when stories break. Making the switch to Internet journalism requires the traditional journalist to be conversant with HTML to be able to directly file his story or news as a webpage, allowing news to be instantly updated on the Web, instead of introducing delays via a separate team of people who convert news items to webpages. While all the job profiles mentioned above have varying requirements, one common requirement for anyone applying for a job in the Internet industry is exposure to the Internet. Shailesh Joshi, VP, Operations, Rediff On The Net, goes a step ahead and looks out for people with a passion for the Internet, besides expertise in their respective field.  All said and done, a job in the Internet industry is not for everyone. A passion for the Internet is a must - and that love is what makes the long hours (often 10-12 hours a day, some all-nighters), and unreasonable deadlines worth it all - that's job satisfaction for you. As for salaries - well that's another area that's vague and covers a wide range, depending on the size of the organisation, and the applicant's experience and expertise. Suffice to say that salaries are usually in keeping with the average salaries in other industries - an Internet programmer would earn as much as he would in a software development firm, while a sales marketing person would earn as much as his counterpart in say, the consumer goods industry.
column11: Publishing, Web technologies, Content, Writing, Journalism, HTML, consumer goods, Vice President Operations, Business Executive, WHO

column2: Senior B2B Writer:?   Creative and Technical Writing   Mu Sigma is a pioneer in the emerging, high-impact area of Decision Sciences. We are the world's largest pure-play Decision Sciences and analytics firm. We help over 140 Fortune 500 clients across more than ten industry verticals to institutionalize and scale data-driven decision-making cost-effectively. With over 3500 decision sciences professionals, we pride ourselves on being a category- and career-defining company.  Brand Mu Sigma is undergoing a revival, and we are embarking on a program of high-impact marketing and brand building. Our goal is to establish Mu Sigma as the market's pre-eminent leader in decision sciences. We are looking for a versatile, experienced  Senior B2B Writer  to create high-quality written content to support our marketing and branding goals. You will play a pivotal role in shaping our brand's voice and message and ensuring our content is engaging and relevant to our target audience.?  Responsibilities   Develop a wide range of content, including blog posts, articles, e-books, white papers, case studies, and more?  Collaborate with marketing, design, and business teams to create and implement effective content marketing strategies?  Take ownership of content development, including researching and writing compelling content that engages our target audience  Research competitor brands and industry trends to come up with content pegs that communicate our unique value proposition and strengths to the correct target audience  Synthesize analyst reports on industry trends and forecasts to formulate and communicate Mu Sigma's unique point-of-view  Liaise with design teams and external agencies to create content for tactical and strategic objectives?  Mentor junior content writers and ensure high-quality content delivery?  Ensure all-around consistency according to brand guidelines?  Thrive in a fast-paced, high-performance environment  Requirements   Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, Communications, or related fields?  At least 7   years  of experience as a content writer, technical writer, or journalist?  Exceptional written and oral communication  Strong storytelling skills  Experience in leading a team of creative and business professionals  Experience working with advertising and PR agencies  Ability to lead and mentor a team of writers

column2: Position Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Marketing Specialist to join our team in the architecture, construction, and interiors industry. The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving our marketing efforts, generating compelling content to support sales, managing and coordinating market exhibitions, conferences, and competitions, overseeing the sales team, and attending client meetings to facilitate initial engagements. This role demands a creative yet analytical mind, exceptional communication skills, and a deep understanding of our industry. Key Responsibilities: Content Generation: Develop high-quality, engaging content for sales materials, brochures, website, social media, newsletters, and other marketing collateral. Collaborate with the design team to create visually appealing and informative content. Ensure all content aligns with the company's brand voice and messaging. Market Exhibitions, Conferences, and Competitions: Research and identify relevant industry exhibitions, conferences, and competitions. Coordinate and manage the companys participation, including booth setup, presentation materials, and promotional items. Develop strategies to maximize visibility and engagement at these events. Network with industry professionals and gather market insights during these events. Sales Team Management: Support the sales team with marketing materials and strategies to enhance their efforts. Provide training and resources to help the sales team effectively communicate our value proposition. Track and analyze the performance of the sales team and marketing initiatives to identify areas for improvement. Client Meetings and Initial Engagements: Attend client meetings alongside the sales team to understand client needs and provide marketing support. Lead initial meetings to introduce the company?? offerings and gather information on potential projects. Ensure a smooth transition from initial engagement to project handover to the relevant internal teams. Market Analysis and Strategy Development: Conduct market research to stay updated on industry trends, competitors, and customer preferences. Develop and implement marketing strategies to enhance the company?? market position and attract new clients. Monitor and report on the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and adjust strategies as needed. Brand Management: Maintain and enhance the company?? brand image through consistent and strategic marketing efforts. Develop and enforce brand guidelines to ensure uniformity across all marketing materials and communications. Collaborative Efforts: Work closely with other departments, including design, project management, and finance, to ensure marketing initiatives are aligned with overall business objectives. Participate in internal meetings to provide marketing insights and contribute to strategic planning. Qualifications: Bachelor?? degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or a related field. Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in marketing, preferably within the architecture, construction, or interiors industry. Proven track record of developing and executing successful marketing campaigns. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strong organizational and project management abilities. Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms, including social media, email marketing, and content management systems. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment. Creative thinking with a strategic mindset.

column2: Role & responsibilities   Tele-caller, you will be responsible for making outbound calls to existing and potential customers with the goal of generating leads, selling products or services, or gathering information. You will represent the company professionally over the phone and provide excellent customer service while achieving performance targets. This role requires effective communication skills, persistence, and a customer-focused approach. Responsibilities: Make outbound calls to prospective and existing customers based on provided lists, leads, or databases. Introduce company products or services to customers and explain their features, benefits, and pricing. Engage in active listening to understand customer needs and preferences. Provide accurate information about products or services and answer customer inquiries. Persuade customers to purchase products or services or schedule appointments, as per campaign objectives. Follow predefined scripts and sales processes while adapting communication style to individual customer interactions. Collect and record customer information, including contact details, preferences, and feedback, in the CRM system. Maintain a high level of professionalism and customer service standards during all interactions. Meet or exceed daily, weekly, and monthly performance targets for call volume, conversion rates, and sales revenue. Handle customer objections and concerns effectively, striving to overcome obstacles and close sales. Collaborate with the sales team to share insights, feedback, and best practices for improving sales performance. Adhere to company policies and procedures, including compliance with telemarketing regulations and ethical standards. Participate in training sessions and skill development activities to enhance sales techniques and product knowledge. Preferred candidate profile   Proven experience as a tele-caller, telemarketer, or similar role, preferably in education industry Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, with a clear and professional phone manner. Strong persuasion and negotiation abilities, with the confidence to make sales pitches and handle objections. Customer-focused mindset with a commitment to delivering a positive customer experience. Ability to work well under pressure and meet tight deadlines while maintaining composure and professionalism. Familiarity with CRM software and call center tools for managing leads, tracking calls, and recording interactions. Basic computer skills and proficiency in using Microsoft Office applications. High school diploma or equivalent; additional education or training in sales or customer service is a plus. Resilience and persistence in pursuing leads and achieving sales targets. Willingness to work flexible hours, including evenings and weekends, to accommodate customer preferences and achieve sales goals. Perks and benefits   Perks and benefits
